attributes.action: suspend ULEZ charge untill virus is clear
attributes.additional_details: safer to travel in private vehicle then public transport, people out of work lack of funds + the mayor's term should have been over a year ago, Government should over look it until the next vote
attributes.background: suspend ULEZ charge untill virus is clear

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Authority.
